import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' function IssuesForm({ issue, postIssue, users, edit, projects, editIssue, issueId, errors }) { const initialState = { title: undefined, description: undefined, targetEndDate: undefined, project: undefined, user: undefined, priority: undefined, status: undefined, type: undefined, } const [state, setState] = useState(initialState) useEffect(() => { console.log(edit) if (edit) { setState({ ...issue, project: issue.project._id, user: issue.user._id }) } else { setState(initialState) } }, [issue]) console.log(state) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() switch (e.target.name) { case "create": postIssue(state) break case "edit": editIssue(issueId, state) break default: return } } let myModalEl = document.getElementById('issueModal') if (myModalEl) { myModalEl.addEventListener('hidden.bs.modal', function (event) { return alert("hello") }) } const projectOptions = projects.map((project, i) => { return }) const userOptions = users.map((user, i) => ( )) const handleChange = (e) => { setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
